-1.title: Pilot
-1.plot: Jason Philips, a well known TV presenter, loved by millions, adored by his family. A man dedicated to bringing resolution and hope to the less fortunate, exposing the truth and making the world a perfect place. From the outside the perfect man but what happens to that same man who has all the answers for everyone else but not for himself. Where does he turn to? With so much pressure and expectation, Jason finds himself on the other side of the fence, drugs, women, the list is endless. 1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Jason Philips is a new upcoming TV chat show host, dedicating his time in front of the camera to bring resolution for couples and families. Dealing with the most serious domestic situations Jason takes no prisoners in his quest to discover the truth and bring resolve for those in need. Off camera, well that's a different story..

imdb.plot outline: Jason Philips, a well known TV presenter, loved by millions, adored by his family. A man dedicated to bringing resolution and hope to the less fortunate, exposing the truth and making the world a perfect place. From the outside the perfect man but what happens to that same man who has all the answers for everyone else but not for himself. Where does he turn to? With so much pressure and expectation, Jason finds himself on the other side of the fence, drugs, women, the list is endless. Is Jason good at his job because it takes one to know one or has Jason become a victim of his own show due to the over exposure to the wrong type of person. One thing is for sure the higher up the ladder you are, the harder you are going to fall. For Jason it's not 'practice what you preach' but 'preach what you practice'

One thing is for sure the higher up the ladder you are, the harder you are going to fall. For Jason it's not 'practice what you preach' but 'preach what you practice'::annon

Jason Philips, a well known TV presenter, loved by millions, adored by his family. A man dedicated to bringing resolution and hope to the less fortunate, exposing the truth and making the world a perfect place. From the outside the perfect man but what happens to that same man who has all the answers for everyone else but not for himself. Where does he turn to? With so much pressure and expectation, Jason finds himself on the other side of the fence, drugs, women, the list is endless. Is Jason good at his job because it takes one to know one or has Jason become a victim of his own show due to the over exposure to the wrong type of person.
